name: OceanRoute
summary:
This app is intended for healing and relaxation.

In this app
You can experience what it's like to just keep running along the sea road.

The refreshing and endless sea road
It will refresh you when you are tired.

Enjoy a peaceful experience.

Operation Description

Left stick (up/down) (vertical rotation of viewpoint)
Right stick (up/down) (Speed Change)
LR Trigger(Brightness change)

A button （decision / BGM change)
B button （decision / Description On/Off)
X or Y Button (BGM volume...
